lrc.lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : The Dentals
[00:00.364] 作词 : The Dentals
[00:01.93]Devil in my hand
[00:08.26]The Dentals
[00:18.93]In the sand, at Tonnys corporal beach
[00:22.53]Eating ice cream and listening to your preach
[00:27.38]Whether an, my survivals great
[00:31.16]And I’m sitting here, drinking a light beer
[00:44.40]Difference scene, now I’m in the snow
[00:48.79]Rocky Mountains are, they are such a blow
[00:53.60]It’s cozy with a fireplace
[00:56.80]And I am sitting here, drinking a like beer
[01:19.60]On a cruise, all the food is free
[01:22.73]I am at the pool, guess who is next to me?
[01:27.32]It’s Jennifer, she a cheerleader
[01:31.80]And I am sitting here drinking a light beer
[01:36.60]I can’t believe I am right here
[01:38.13]I can’t believe I drinking a light beer
[01:40.40]Why do I hold this drink in my hand?
[01:45.10]I can’t believe I am right here
[01:46.48]I can’t believe I drinking a light beer
[01:48.62]My luck that it’s only a nightmare.
[01:52.94]I wake up, the live beats gone away
[01:57.25]But sadly, Jennifer is away too
[02:01.35]I guess both things where, Too good or bad to be true
[02:05.36]And I am, ok with that
[02:09.81]Yes I am

tlyric.lyric:
[by:枫染流年]
[00:01.93]
[00:08.26]
[00:18.93]在沙滩，托尼斯下士的海岸
[00:22.53]吃着冰淇淋，听着你说教
[00:27.38]是否我，还能活着是奇迹
[00:31.16]我坐在这里，喝着淡啤酒
[00:44.40]不同的场景，此刻我在雪地里
[00:48.79]这里是洛基山，狂风拼命吹
[00:53.60]但却很舒服，房里有个壁炉
[00:56.80]而我坐在这里，喝着淡啤酒
[01:19.60]在游船上，所有的食物随便拿
[01:22.73]我在泳池边，猜猜谁在我身旁？
[01:27.32]珍妮弗,她是啦啦队长
[01:31.80]而我坐在这里，喝着淡啤酒
[01:36.60]我不敢相信我就在这儿
[01:38.13]我不敢相信我喝了淡啤酒
[01:40.40]为什么我还把这东西拿在手里？
[01:45.10]我不敢相信我就在这儿
[01:46.48]我不敢相信我喝了淡啤酒
[01:48.62]这简直就像是一场噩梦
[01:52.94]我醒来，现场的节奏消失了
[01:57.25]但很遗憾，詹妮弗也走了
[02:01.35]我想这两者，太过美好所以难以成真
[02:05.36]而我现在，感觉还不赖
[02:09.81]没错是的
